bit_field_value.name: VERID_FEATURE_0b0000000000000000
bit_field_value.description: Standard features implemented.

bit_field_value.name: VERID_FEATURE_0b0000000000000001
bit_field_value.description: Supports state, logic and parallel modes.

bit_field_value.name: CTRL_FLEXEN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: FlexIO module is disabled.

bit_field_value.name: CTRL_FLEXEN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: FlexIO module is enabled.

bit_field_value.name: CTRL_SWRST_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Software reset is disabled

bit_field_value.name: CTRL_SWRST_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Software reset is enabled, all FlexIO registers except the Control Register are reset.

bit_field_value.name: CTRL_FASTACC_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Configures for normal register accesses to FlexIO

bit_field_value.name: CTRL_FASTACC_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Configures for fast register accesses to FlexIO

bit_field_value.name: CTRL_DBGE_0b0
bit_field_value.description: FlexIO is disabled in debug modes.

bit_field_value.name: CTRL_DBGE_0b1
bit_field_value.description: FlexIO is enabled in debug modes

bit_field_value.name: CTRL_DOZEN_0b0
bit_field_value.description: FlexIO enabled in Doze modes.

bit_field_value.name: CTRL_DOZEN_0b1
bit_field_value.description: FlexIO disabled in Doze modes.

bit_field_value.name: SHIFTCTL0_SMOD_0b001
bit_field_value.description: Receive mode. Captures the current Shifter content into the SHIFTBUF on expiration of the Timer.

bit_field_value.name: SHIFTCTL0_SMOD_0b010
bit_field_value.description: Transmit mode. Load SHIFTBUF contents into the Shifter on expiration of the Timer.

bit_field_value.name: SHIFTCTL0_SMOD_0b100
bit_field_value.description: Match Store mode. Shifter data is compared to SHIFTBUF content on expiration of the Timer.

bit_field_value.name: SHIFTCTL0_SMOD_0b101
bit_field_value.description: Match Continuous mode. Shifter data is continuously compared to SHIFTBUF contents.

bit_field_value.name: SHIFTCTL0_PINPOL_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Pin is active high

bit_field_value.name: SHIFTCTL0_PINPOL_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Pin is active low

bit_field_value.name: SHIFTCTL0_PINCFG_0b00
bit_field_value.description: Shifter pin output disabled

bit_field_value.name: SHIFTCTL0_PINCFG_0b01
bit_field_value.description: Shifter pin open drain or bidirectional output enable

bit_field_value.name: SHIFTCTL0_PINCFG_0b10
bit_field_value.description: Shifter pin bidirectional output data

bit_field_value.name: SHIFTCTL0_PINCFG_0b11
bit_field_value.description: Shifter pin output

bit_field_value.name: SHIFTCTL0_TIMPOL_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Shift on posedge of Shift clock

bit_field_value.name: SHIFTCTL0_TIMPOL_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Shift on negedge of Shift clock

bit_field_value.name: SHIFTCFG0_SSTART_0b00
bit_field_value.description: Start bit disabled for transmitter/receiver/match store, transmitter loads data on enable

bit_field_value.name: SHIFTCFG0_SSTART_0b01
bit_field_value.description: Start bit disabled for transmitter/receiver/match store, transmitter loads data on first shift

bit_field_value.name: SHIFTCFG0_SSTART_0b10
bit_field_value.description: Transmitter outputs start bit value 0 before loading data on first shift, receiver/match store sets error flag if start bit is not 0

bit_field_value.name: SHIFTCFG0_SSTART_0b11
bit_field_value.description: Transmitter outputs start bit value 1 before loading data on first shift, receiver/match store sets error flag if start bit is not 1

bit_field_value.name: SHIFTCFG0_SSTOP_0b00
bit_field_value.description: Stop bit disabled for transmitter/receiver/match store

bit_field_value.name: SHIFTCFG0_SSTOP_0b01
bit_field_value.description: Reserved for transmitter/receiver/match store

bit_field_value.name: SHIFTCFG0_SSTOP_0b10
bit_field_value.description: Transmitter outputs stop bit value 0 on store, receiver/match store sets error flag if stop bit is not 0

bit_field_value.name: SHIFTCFG0_SSTOP_0b11
bit_field_value.description: Transmitter outputs stop bit value 1 on store, receiver/match store sets error flag if stop bit is not 1

bit_field_value.name: SHIFTCFG0_INSRC_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Shifter N+1 Output

bit_field_value.name: TIMCTL0_TIMOD_0b00
bit_field_value.description: Timer Disabled.

bit_field_value.description: Dual 8-bit counters baud/bit mode.

bit_field_value.description: Dual 8-bit counters PWM mode.

bit_field_value.description: Single 16-bit counter mode.

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG0_TSTART_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Start bit disabled

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG0_TSTART_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Start bit enabled

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG0_TSTOP_0b00
bit_field_value.description: Stop bit disabled

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG0_TSTOP_0b01
bit_field_value.description: Stop bit is enabled on timer compare

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG0_TSTOP_0b10
bit_field_value.description: Stop bit is enabled on timer disable

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG0_TSTOP_0b11
bit_field_value.description: Stop bit is enabled on timer compare and timer disable

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG0_TIMENA_0b000
bit_field_value.description: Timer always enabled

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG0_TIMENA_0b001
bit_field_value.description: Timer enabled on Timer N-1 enable

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG0_TIMENA_0b010
bit_field_value.description: Timer enabled on Trigger high

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG0_TIMENA_0b011
bit_field_value.description: Timer enabled on Trigger high and Pin high

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG0_TIMENA_0b100
bit_field_value.description: Timer enabled on Pin rising edge

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG0_TIMENA_0b101
bit_field_value.description: Timer enabled on Pin rising edge and Trigger high

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG0_TIMENA_0b110
bit_field_value.description: Timer enabled on Trigger rising edge

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG0_TIMENA_0b111
bit_field_value.description: Timer enabled on Trigger rising or falling edge

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG0_TIMDIS_0b000
bit_field_value.description: Timer never disabled

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG0_TIMDIS_0b001
bit_field_value.description: Timer disabled on Timer N-1 disable

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG0_TIMDIS_0b010
bit_field_value.description: Timer disabled on Timer compare

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG0_TIMDIS_0b011
bit_field_value.description: Timer disabled on Timer compare and Trigger Low

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG0_TIMDIS_0b100
bit_field_value.description: Timer disabled on Pin rising or falling edge

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG0_TIMDIS_0b101
bit_field_value.description: Timer disabled on Pin rising or falling edge provided Trigger is high

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG0_TIMDIS_0b110
bit_field_value.description: Timer disabled on Trigger falling edge

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG0_TIMRST_0b000
bit_field_value.description: Timer never reset

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG0_TIMRST_0b010
bit_field_value.description: Timer reset on Timer Pin equal to Timer Output

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG0_TIMRST_0b011
bit_field_value.description: Timer reset on Timer Trigger equal to Timer Output

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG0_TIMRST_0b100
bit_field_value.description: Timer reset on Timer Pin rising edge

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG0_TIMRST_0b110
bit_field_value.description: Timer reset on Trigger rising edge

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG0_TIMRST_0b111
bit_field_value.description: Timer reset on Trigger rising or falling edge

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG0_TIMDEC_0b00
bit_field_value.description: Decrement counter on FlexIO clock, Shift clock equals Timer output.

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG0_TIMDEC_0b01
bit_field_value.description: Decrement counter on Trigger input (both edges), Shift clock equals Timer output.

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG0_TIMDEC_0b10
bit_field_value.description: Decrement counter on Pin input (both edges), Shift clock equals Pin input.

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG0_TIMDEC_0b11
bit_field_value.description: Decrement counter on Trigger input (both edges), Shift clock equals Trigger input.

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG0_TIMOUT_0b00
bit_field_value.description: Timer output is logic one when enabled and is not affected by timer reset

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG0_TIMOUT_0b01
bit_field_value.description: Timer output is logic zero when enabled and is not affected by timer reset

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG0_TIMOUT_0b10
bit_field_value.description: Timer output is logic one when enabled and on timer reset

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG0_TIMOUT_0b11
bit_field_value.description: Timer output is logic zero when enabled and on timer reset

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG1_TSTART_0b0
bit_field_value.description: Start bit disabled

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG1_TSTART_0b1
bit_field_value.description: Start bit enabled

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG1_TSTOP_0b00
bit_field_value.description: Stop bit disabled

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG1_TSTOP_0b01
bit_field_value.description: Stop bit is enabled on timer compare

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG1_TSTOP_0b10
bit_field_value.description: Stop bit is enabled on timer disable

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG1_TSTOP_0b11
bit_field_value.description: Stop bit is enabled on timer compare and timer disable

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG1_TIMENA_0b000
bit_field_value.description: Timer always enabled

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG1_TIMENA_0b001

bit_field_value.description: Decrement counter on Trigger input (both edges), Shift clock equals Timer output.

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG1_TIMDEC_0b11
bit_field_value.description: Decrement counter on Trigger input (both edges), Shift clock equals Trigger input.

bit_field_value.description: Timer output is logic one when enabled and on timer reset

bit_field_value.name: TIMCFG1_TIMOUT_0b11
